creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Marilyn Tupper Doe
description: night scene with willow tree at R, surrounded by white crisscrossing fence; wooden lantern LRC; old fashioned buildings and a mountain in background on street; a few people on street
dimension:
10 5/8 × 9 5/8 in. (26.99 × 24.45 cm) (sight)
36 7/8 × 34 7/8 × 1 1/4 in. (93.66 × 88.58 × 3.18 cm) (outer frame, framed with others, see notes)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Twelve Months of Kyoto 京名勝十二月
title: November (The Willow tree at the gate of the Shimabara)
